ogTitle: simulating covid-19 spread: is this what a covid cough looks like? - smarther news
ogDescription: new study and video by the university of florida atlantic college of engineering and computer science shows us what *may* happen to covid-19 droplets when someone coughs or sneezes.
summary: New study and video by the University of Florida Atlantic College of Engineering and Computer Science shows us what *may* happen to COVID-19 droplets when someone coughs or sneezes.
